item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (440 points | 20 comments)
2. Playstation 2 GS emulation – the final frontier of Vulkan compute emulation (46 points | 5 comments)
3. Taming the beast that is the Django ORM – An introduction (57 points | 19 comments)

5. Did your car witness a crime? (199 points | 424 comments)
6. Making an atomic trampoline [video] (64 points | 16 comments)
7. MapRoulette: the micro-tasking tool for OpenStreetMap (29 points | 11 comments)
8. WatchYourLAN: Lightweight Network IP Scanner (120 points | 11 comments)
9. A brief history of barbed wire fence telephone networks (57 points | 7 comments)
10. The Atari 7800 (5 points | discuss)
11. Percona Everest: open-source automated database provisioning and management (51 points | 20 comments)
12. Astronomers puzzled by little red galaxies that seem impossibly dense (47 points | 29 comments)
13. Brazil's X ban is sending lots of people to Bluesky (191 points | 312 comments)
14. Epilepsy Protection for VRChat (13 points | discuss)
15. The case of the nearly 7k missing pancreases (7 points | discuss)

19. Lucee: A light-weight dynamic CFML scripting language for the JVM (65 points | 25 comments)
20. Show HN: Typeform alternative, turns Markdown to forms (136 points | 44 comments)
21. Solving the labyrinth puzzle from the university quest using Python (7 points | discuss)
22. Non-Determinism and Overcount on Modern Hardware Performance Counters [pdf] (15 points | 1 comment)
23. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
24. Chatbots Are Primed to Warp Reality (6 points | 5 comments)
25. There is only one amphibian emoji (49 points | 55 comments)
26. Buy, Borrow, Die – Explained (392 points | 306 comments)
27. Is my vision that bad? No, it's just a bug in Apple's Calculator (571 points | 362 comments)
28. My fake job in Y2K preparedness (115 points | 80 comments)
29. Designing a Timeline for Mobile Video Editing (65 points | 7 comments)
30. The Threat to OpenAI (123 points | 122 comments)
